Bash(git -C "D:\AAWS\nammaooru\shop-management-system" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Use PATCH inventory endpoint for stock updates in Angular frontend

- Changed stock update from PUT /shop-products/{id} to PATCH /shop-products/{id}/inventory
- The PUT endpoint requires masterProductId and price (validation fails with only stockQuantity)
- The PATCH inventory endpoint only needs quantity and operation params
- Also fixed other PUT endpoints to use correct /shop-products/ path instead of /shop-owner/products/
- Bump version to 1.0.181

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(ssh root@65.21.4.236 "docker logs --tail 500 shop-management_backend_26 2>&1 | grep -E ''(1764337831774|FCM|push|notification|PREPARING)'' | tail -50")
Bash(ssh root@65.21.4.236 "docker logs --tail 500 shop-management_backend_27 2>&1 | grep -E ''(CONFIRMED|Firebase|FCM|notification|sent)'' | head -40")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Use Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilderCustomizer to preserve Spring Boot defaults

- Previous @Primary ObjectMapper bean was breaking Spring Data Page serialization
- Now using Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilderCustomizer which customizes the existing ObjectMapper
- This preserves all Spring Boot default configurations while adding IST timezone conversion
- Fixes "Could not write JSON: UnsupportedOperationException" error for PageImpl serialization

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
